title: Native English Speaking Preschool - Hong Kong
author: julieneric
description:
Teach and Touch A Life Forever… 
• Complete, tested lesson plans for every class 
• A local qualified assistant instructor 
• Paid training at Tutor Time Hong Kong 
• Paid vacation on School Holidays 
• Medical Insurance provided 
• A competitive salary 
• Full Time 
• Must have at least 2 years relevant experience with 1 – 6 years old age group. 
• We offer a friendly, dynamic atmosphere with a complete benefits package 
• We will sponsor you for a HK work visa, but to satisfy HK Immigration you must: 
- have a Bachelors degree 
- have some teaching experience with references AND/OR TEFL certificate 
- Native English Speaker 
• If you are interested, please email the following to teachers@ttimehk.com: 
1. a detailed CV 
2. recent photo 
3. copy of your degree certificate and any other relevant qualifications.

ABOUT TUTOR TIME 
http://www.tutortime.com.hk 
http://www.facebook.com/tutortimehk 
Email: teachers@ttimehk.com

Guiding Children’s First Steps Since 1988

Tutor Time® was established in 1988 in Florida, USA. We have more than 500 corporate and affiliated schools throughout the United States, Europe, Hong Kong and Indonesia. Currently, Tutor Time® is one of the largest provider of preschool and educational services in the United States.

Tutor Time® in Hong Kong was established in 2000, with the first two schools opened at the same time in 2001 at Kowloon Tong and Red Hill Plaza. It was followed by Tutor Time® WOW at Kowloon Tong in 2005, Tutor Time® Braemar Hill in 2008, Tutor Time® Mid-Levels in 2010, and Tutor Time® WOW Central in 2012.

Since our schools' opening, all Tutor Time® schools have attained “Schools of Excellence" with scores of 95% or above on the annual evaluations from Tutor Time® USA and have been selected to receive various awards from multiple organizations.
kicker: TEACHERS NEEDED for Tutor Time - Hong Kong - (6 months to 6 years old children)

title: ✰✰✰Beijing - deal with school directly - NO AGENTS - well established school - great working environment ✰✰✰
author: julieneric
description:
www.facebook.com/aihuaenglishacademy   
en.aihua-english.com

We are hiring foreign teachers to join our growing team in Beijing! Established 15 years ago, Aihua has grown to have over 50 foreign teachers and 100 Chinese staff. It is the best place to make your first start in China with strong support and training. I hope to welcome you to our community soon.

Most of our classes have a maximum of 8 students, and teachers follow a set curriculum supplemented by an interactive whiteboard and extensive multimedia material. Foreign teachers work together with local co-teachers, who act as a bridge between the school and the parents.

Foreign teachers are hired for 90 teaching periods (45-50 mins) per month. Our teachers normally teach around 20 periods per week. There are no office hours, but teachers must prepare lessons well, and attend weekly training and meetings.

Wages and benefits

Competitive - plus bonuses 
Health insurance 
Working visa 
Flights covered

Here are many of the other reasons why teachers choose us over other schools;

We always deal fairly with teachers. We recognize that our reputation for fair dealing is our most important resource. Above all, we value the honour and the good name of our school. Feel free to read blogs by our teachers on our website and social media here;

www.facebook.com/aihuaenglishacademy   
en.aihua-english.com

We have western management. This sets us apart from many other schools in China. This creates a more comfortable and transparent working environment for our foreign teachers.

We have a friendly, fun and professional working environment by providing complete support to our foreign teachers in all aspects of life and teaching.

We run a set curriculum, and our terms are fixed. A teacher receives a timetable at the beginning of the term, and this remains constant throughout the term. The teacher will have the teachers book, and the students will have the students book. A clear course plan detailing the speed of teaching will be presented to the teacher.

Extensive multimedia resources related to each unit in each program are available to the teacher.

Our classes are small, with a maximum of eight students. Experienced and helpful Chinese teachers work together and support our foreign teachers in these smaller classes where you can really get to know your students.

We have 3 professional development tracks for teachers wishing to take on higher roles at our school: training, administration and management.

Free professional Mandarin lessons. We have an in-house professional Chinese teacher who has a degree in teaching Chinese as a second language. She will help you learn the local lingo fast.

If you are interested in working at Aihua, please write to the Recruitment Manager Robert Warman, at robert@aihua-english.com or robert-warman@outlook.com
kicker: Well established school - great working environment

title: TICO English is looking for candidates to fill ESL Instructor positions
author: julieneric
description:
